_sText:
Good Morning/Afternoon/Evening.

My name is Brett Bernier (AKA Tetsu0) and this is my entry for TWHL.INFO's 32nd Mapping competition.

Title: de_lotus
Engine: Counterstrike Source
Players: 32
Bombsites: 2

This map was inspired visually by cs_italy, but I tried to bring the "figure-eight" and chokepoint elements from de_dust and de_aztec into play. This is my first official 'finished' release of a CS:S map so there is going to be a lot of room for improvement.

Zip file updated with filestructure including all materials, navigation, and BSP files.
If there are any questions/comments, please drop me a PM here: http://twhl.info/user.php?id=1741
or send me an email @ brettpcg@gmail.com

Thanks, and enjoy!

--
Defusal map set in Italy
Made for compo 32
set for 32 players

Terrorists are angry that the locals are buying foreign fruit and cheap wine.
Blow up the market and wine cellar to show the locals that you don't mess around with imports and imposters.

Counter-Terrorists, help the locals drink and eat what they'd like. Give the terrorists a nice talking to with a .50 round to the helmet. Defuse those pesky bombs to keep your watermelons melony and your wine grapey.
